root: ^You kids really are adamant about doing good on the final? I didn’t even study for any of my classes.
^No wonder you’re working as a janitor...
^Do you plan on helping us study?

c-0: ^Giving me the royal shaft, huh? Fail the exam for me, why don’t you?
c-1: ^Can’t remember for the life of me, I’ll tell you. I was more focused on getting blitzed.
c-2: ^My time’s over kid. It’s your turn to put in the work.
c-3: ^Cleaning after youngins’... just joking, it doesn’t matter what it was anymore.
g-0: ^I’m just here to make sure the doors are locked after you all go up. Can’t have these doors unlocked now can I?
^You youngins ain't gonna be able to leave without the Professor and his key, so no winging out for you guys.
